yana aya wisin sesu charitha nirupanaya karanawa.kathawa gana kiyanawanam sapa pahasu lesa nirmanaya karapu nawak wata thamayi kathawa gethila thiyenne.aluth awurudda samarima wenuwen mema nawe wishala pirisak winodakami lesin gaman gannawa.mema nawa hotalayak wage wishala ekak.melesa kathawa galagena yana atharathura wishala muhudu rallakin nawa anathurata pathwenawa, ese owun kawaradawakawath nosithu deyakata owunta muhuna denna siduwenawa.ese anathurata path nawe muhuden yata thiyena kotasa udata awith anek uda kotasa muhadata yata wenawa.ee kiyanne nawa udu yatikuru wenawa.mema nawa lesiyen gilenne nathi widihata thamayi nirmanaya karala thiyenne.mema anathuru hethuwen wishala pirisak miya yana athara sulu pramanayak ithuruwenawa.onna othanin thamayi kathawa patan ganne.serama udu yatikuru wi athi nisa mowunta yanna wenne lesi pahasu gamanak nam nowe.wenada gaman kara hurupurudu wu lift,padipelawal dan serama thiyenne anith paththatayi.gathawana sama thathparayak pasama jiwithayath maranayath athara satanaka nirathawimata mowunt hata siduwenawa.aapada thathwayakadi minisunta muhuna dimata siduwana thathwaya,obata mema chithrapataya narambaimen athwidagatha hakiya.

eka neme tharu akke mama dakka gunadasa kapuge gayana karana "kawuruth ennathi kawuruth dannathi malpethi wisirunu mal pare kiyana" ee janapriya sinduwe mul kotasa liyala thiyenne saman athawudahetti nemeyi "rasika"kiya ohuge mithuruyak wisin liyu kawiyakata ithiri pada liya eeya githayak kala bawa saman aathawudahetti wisin kiya thibenawa puwathpathakata.ee rasika kiyana nama dakkama mata hithuna ee githaye mul kotasa liyanna aththe tharu akkawathda danne naha kiyala.
